name: 图尔古特·通帕尔普
name_full: 图尔古特·通帕尔普 Turgut Tuncalp
introduction: Turgut Tunçalp was born on 12th May 1976 in Sakarya, Turkey. Graduated from Özel Drama Tiyatro. Throughout his acting career, he starred in the Tv series; "Ayva Sari Nar Kirmizi", "Ask Mahkumu", "Sifre", "Emret Komutanim", "Ümit Milli", "Korkusuzlar", "Iki Yabanci", "Çilgin Kanal", "Sakarya Firat", "Yildiz Masali", "Kesanli Ali Destani", "Merhamet", "Kaçak", "Dirilis- Ertugrul", "Rüzgarin Kalbi", "Vatanim Sensin", "Rüya".The long feature films he played are "Pars Kiraz Operasyonu", "Çanakkale 1915", "Kogus Akademisi", "Delisin Deli", "Daha" and "Askin Gören Gözlere Ihtiyaci Yoktur".He played the role of "Kasim" in the Tv series "Çukur" as a guest star. The last movie he co-starred "Müslüm" will be at the movie theaters in autumn 2018.
